name: Guardian: Killing Zone
description:
If you are reading this, you are one of the survivors. After the nuclear option failed to eradicate the undead hordes, your unit was called in to spearhead Operation KZ (Killing Zone), a mission to terminate the remaining undead that occupy the former Northeast United States territories.

The Guardian: Killing Zone is a zombie combat game designed to transform your mobile device into a Virtual Reality portal to a post-apocalyptic world. You assume the role of a futuristic combat soldier known as "The Guardian." You are taked with leading the assault on remaining enemy combatants in a destroyed urban setting.

Created in partnership with Tzumi, The Guardian: Killing Zone is a fast-paced turret-shooter game that will give you nightmares.
